name: Up We Go!!!
description:
Game for two players made during Fifty FIfty Game Jam

Player 1, keyboard:

A/D -> move

Left Ctrl -> ready

hold Left Ctrl + A/D -> use item

Player 2 keyboard:

Left/Right Arrows -> move

Num Enter -> ready

hold Num Enter + Left/Right  -> use item

Xbox gamepad:

Left/Right D-Pad -> move

A -> ready

hold A + Left/Right D-Pad ->  ready
